items.title: Sidetrade: 2025 H1 revenue, up 19% at constant exchange rates
items.summary: Sidetrade reports a 19% increase in revenue in the first half of 2025 despite economic headwinds, with a decrease in Annual Contract Value of new deals compared to the previous year.

items.title: Chandrababu Naidu Unveils $2.4-Trillion Vision For 2047
items.summary: Andhra Pradesh unveils $2.4 trillion vision for 2047, aiming to grow the state's economy significantly by that year.

items.title: Pixel Watch 4 specs leak reveals new co-processor, battery life boost
items.summary: Specs for the upcoming Pixel Watch 4 have leaked, revealing a new co-processor and improved battery life. The leaks suggest significant upgrades for this year's wearables.

items.title: Sony's 61MP RX1R III Compact Camera Returns After A Decade With Big Upgrades
items.summary: Sony's 61MP RX1R III Compact Camera makes a return after a decade with major upgrades, including a new sensor, AI autofocus, and the latest features.

items.title: Ex-Waymo engineers launch Bedrock Robotics with $80M to automate construction | TechCrunch
items.summary: Former Waymo engineers have founded Bedrock Robotics with $80 million in funding to automate construction processes.

items.title: Washington clears AMD to resume shipments of advanced AI chips to China
items.summary: Washington clears AMD to resume shipments of advanced AI chips to China, allowing access to China's AI market and potentially boosting both vendors' revenue.

items.title: Pluto Labs' 'Strategic Efficiency' AI Outperforms Google & Anthropic Models at a Fraction of the Cost
items.summary: Pluto Labs' 'Strategic Efficiency' AI Outperforms Google & Anthropic Models at a Fraction of the Cost in the race to create an 'AI Scientist' capable of independent scientific discovery, making significant waves as a Korean startup.

items.title: CEO of $14 billion AI firm Perplexity says the secret to success is ‘sleeping with that fear’ that your competitor will steal your idea
items.summary: CEO of $14 billion AI firm Perplexity believes success lies in 'sleeping with that fear' of competitors stealing ideas, using pressure as fuel.

items.title: CEO of $14 billion AI firm Perplexity says the secret to success is ‘sleeping with that fear’ that your competitor will steal your idea
items.summary: CEO of $14 billion AI firm Perplexity emphasizes the importance of using the fear of competitors stealing your idea as motivation rather than letting it paralyze you.

items.title: Pastor Fired from Job After Ignoring Chosen Pronoun
items.summary: A Louisiana pastor was fired from his job at a local library for refusing to use a co-worker's preferred pronouns, sparking a debate on ethics and inclusivity in the workplace.

items.title: Fortnite's Speedy New Game Mode is Giving Players a Free Item if You Log in Now
items.summary: Fortnite's new limited game mode offers an incentive for players to log in, using AI-generated voice. The v36.20 update was released after downtime.

items.title: Warning Issued As Hundreds of Thousands Told to Stay Out of the Water
items.summary: More than 270,000 people in three states were warned to stay out of Lake Superior's waters due to dangerous conditions, with the warning being generated by an AI voice. National Weather Service lead meteorologist mentioned the inconsistencies that may occur with AI-generated messages.

items.title: Tesla Flaunts Fiduciary Rules — And Its Workforce Is Fleeing
items.summary: Tesla is being criticized for flouting fiduciary rules, leading to an exodus of its workforce. Senator Elizabeth Warren has raised concerns about the company's duties towards its workers and shareholders.

items.title: MAGA's Epstein Files Fight Shows the Long Tail of QAnon
items.summary: The MAGA's fight to keep the Epstein files hidden highlights the use of the case as a political tool, similar to the broader sex trafficking panic. This raises ethical questions about the manipulation of sensitive issues for political gain.

items.title: Google plugs AI into nuclear reactor biz – what could possibly go wrong?
items.summary: Google and Westinghouse Electric are utilizing AI to speed up the construction of nuclear plants and ensure grid stability.

items.title: So Now You’re Just Going To Bribe Me For Reviews?
items.summary: Companies are beginning to bribe individuals for reviews in order to increase their visibility in AI Overviews, raising ethical concerns.

items.title: ISC2 Research Reveals Cybersecurity Teams Are Taking a Cautious Approach to AI Adoption
items.summary: ISC2 published its 2025 AI Adoption Pulse Survey to measure cybersecurity teams' cautious approach to adopting AI security tools.

items.title: Disney Imagineering Moves the AI Bar by Encouraging BDX Droids ‘to Emote,’ Telling Them ‘You Are Smart’
items.summary: Disney Imagineering is pushing the boundaries of AI by encouraging BDX droids to 'emote' and telling them 'You are smart'. Walt Disney created Imagineering as a place for inventors, engineers, and designers to innovate using the latest technology for Disney properties worldwide.

items.title: Why haven't we auto-translated all AI alignment content?
items.summary: Gemini 2.5 Pro is a pretty good translator for auto-translating AI alignment content, but it has limitations such as being overly literal and occasionally failing to translate certain words.

items.title: FDA Issues Risk Warning for Potato Chips Recall
items.summary: FDA issued a risk warning for a potato chips recall due to possible allergen presence, with the information being AI-generated. Saratoga Potato Chips LLC is the company behind the recall.

items.summary: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 is receiving positive reviews, with users tempted to switch from iPhones. The phone is being praised for its foldable design and features.

items.summary: My formal speed tests show that SpaceX’s satellite service keeps improving year after year, proving to be faster than ever. It remains a game-changer for folks who have no good wired Internet options where they live.

items.title: aiyt 0.4.0
items.summary: The new version 0.4.0 of aiyt allows users to transcribe, chat, and summarize YouTube videos using AI technology. This application could have a wide range of practical uses for individuals and businesses alike.

items.title: Announcing Amazon Nova customization in Amazon SageMaker AI
items.summary: Amazon Nova can now be extensively customized through Amazon SageMaker AI using various techniques like pre-training, fine-tuning, reinforcement learning, and model distillation.

items.summary: Amazon Bedrock AgentCore allows for secure deployment and operation of AI agents at any scale, providing enterprise-grade security and streamlined development with any open-source framework.

items.title: SkillOrbit.io Announces the Launch of Its AI-Powered Learning Academy to Empower Modern Entrepreneurs
items.summary: SkillOrbit.io announced the launch of its AI-powered online academy focused on entrepreneurial education, aimed at empowering modern entrepreneurs. The academy is scheduled to roll out mid-July 2025.

items.title: Wildfires show why CBC needs public safety mandate, McGill research centre says
items.summary: A research centre at McGill University argues that public safety should be added to CBC/Radio-Canada's mandate in light of the wildfires across Canada, highlighting the need for a stronger focus on public safety in media.
